modName: Sexy Vanilla Female Armor for UNP and SevenBase with BBP
summary:
Work in progress to make all Vanilla Armor in Skyrim to be more \"Sexy\" in both Replacer and Standalone. Well you may call it Skimpy, Revealing or whatsoever, but for me the word of \"Sexy\" is hotter LOL.

[b]Update :[/b] Completed all vanilla armor for UNP, current project conversions to SevenBase.
descriptionHtml:
This Mod is a work in progress to convert all armor in Skyrim to be more Sexy looking. It has both Standalone and Replacer for you to choose, so cheers up. If you find any problem in any of these armors, please report in the comment section with a screenshot of the problem so I can fix it.

Feel free to use it as long as you put credit on me. And upload your screenshot so you can share it. I like to see other and it encourage me to do more. I hope you can enjoy it and please endorse if you like it since it will make this mod easier to be found by other people.


[heading][b][size=6][color=#DB7900]Important Notice :[/color][/size][/b][/heading]
As of the update Replacer 1.0.9 i\'ll use esp file, the reason was Bethesda way of handling some armor meshes that was unisex (it means same boots and gauntlets are used by both male and female). Unless u want to see Farkas and Vilkas running around wearing Wolf armor with high heels then the esp file is the only solution. See the list bellow to see what\'s corrected by esp files.

[b]Corrected Files :[/b]
[list=1]
[*]Corrected Wolf armor so female will use custom boots instead of male boots. [color=red][b]Update 1.0.9 - UNP[/b][/color]
[*]Corrected Guild Master ground item referring to Linwe\'s Armor. [color=red][b]Update 1.0.9 - UNP[/b][/color]
[*]Fix of some armor not showing necklace and amulet. Credits go to Wast1980, it\'s based on his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35525]AllArmorsShowAmulets[/url]. [color=red][b]Update 1.0.9 - UNP[/b][/color]
[*]Karliah\'s armor are now playable. [color=red][b]Update 1.0.9 - UNP[/b][/color]
[*]Corrected Wolf armor not showing amulet/necklace. Credits go to Wast1980, he help me fix it. [color=red][b]Update 1.1.0 - UNP[/b][/color]
[*]Corrected Falmer armor not showing amulet/neklace and ring. [color=red][b]Update 1.1.1 - UNP[/b][/color] 
[*]Corrected Stormcloak armor so female will use custom boots instead of male boots. [color=red][b]Update 1.1.2 - UNP[/b][/color]
[*]Corrected ground item so male PC will see it as normal and not the sexy version. Credits go to Nemesis03, he is the one who fix it. [color=red][b]Update 1.1.2 - UNP[/b][/color]
[*]Tsun\'s armor are now Heavy armor and can be crafted at forge under Steel and receive Temper bonus from Advance Armor Perk. [color=red][b]Update 1.1.3 - UNP[/b][/color]
[*]Tsun\'s set divided into Tsun\'s Bracer, Tsun\'s Boots, and Tsun\'s Cuirass. It has stat slightly above Steel Plate armor. [color=red][b]Update 1.1.3 - UNP[/b][/color]
[*]Set weight and prices to Tsun\'s set. [color=red][b]Update 1.1.4 - UNP[/b][/color]
[*]Corrected ground for Worn Shrouded armor and Tumbler gloves. Credits go to Nemesis03, he the is one who found the problem. [color=red][b]Update 1.1.4 - UNP[/b][/color]
[*]Add a Russian version of esp file in the optional download. Credits go to Nemesis03 he is the one who made it. [color=red][b]Update 1.1.4 - UNP[/b][/color]
[*]Fix some minor problem, making one pack download as a final version unless some problem were found. [color=red][b]Update 1.1.5 - UNP[/b][/color]
[*]Added some fix for first person view of Tsun\'s armor. Credits go to Nemesis03 he is the one who fix it. [color=red][b]Update 1.1.6 - UNP[/b][/color]
[*]Added some fix for first person view of Tsun\'s armor for the Russian version. Credits go to Nemesis03 he is the one who fix it. [color=red][b]Update 1.1.6 - UNP[/b][/color]
[/list] 

I have change some part and do some fix for update 1.1.5 as it was considered final version for vanilla UNP, so it\'s [b]HIGHLY RECOMEMENDED[/b] to delete previous instalation before updating to 1.1.5 or else problem might occur.
This list will added over time since there are several unisex armor and i might find another problem.

[heading][b][size=6][color=#DB7900]Current Completed List :[/color][/size][/b][/heading]
[b][size=4][color=#DB7900]UNP Version[/color][/size][/b]

[list=1]
[*][b][size=2]Hide Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Studed Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Scaled Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Scaled Horn Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Leather Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Iron Armor[/size][/b] 
[*][b][size=2]Banded Iron Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Steel Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Steel Plate Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Elven Armor[/size][/b]
   Added optional download for more form fitting boots, see screenshot in image section for more details. Credits go to asianboy345.
[*][b][size=2]Orcish Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Dwarven Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Glass Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Ebony Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Dragonscale[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Dragonplate Armor[/size][/b]
   It has 2 version, 1st is the \"Sexy\" set which is without any enchantment and 2nd the \"True\" set
   with unique enchantment but please be aware that the enchanment is quite powerfull.
[*][b][size=2]- Daedric Armor[/size][/b]
   It take quite some time to finish it, since i want to keep the glow and thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2984692]Xanshio[/url] with his awesome [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21570]Skyrim Extended Glow[/url] i\'m able to do it. The glow from Boots and Gauntlets are from his mod so be sure to endorse him if u like it and also in his Mod page are Tutorial on how to change the intensity and color of the glow, try it if u want to make it brighter or dimmer since i personally increase the glow 3x to make it look better in my opinion or just changing the glow color to blue, purple or even pink maybe. Daedric are updated with new high boots, thanks for asianboy345 telling me better idea about making the thigh filled, it will be added in update file so download it if u like it. Added change to the Breastplate to make it more different from vanilla.
[*][b][size=2]Blades Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Nightingale Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Wolf Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Savior\'s Hide Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Guild Master Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Thieves Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Karliah\'s Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Linwe\'s Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Ancient Nord Armor[/size][/b]
   This is the longest armor i made by taking 3 day , most of it for fixing bone weighting since this one is hard as hell for me, but i like the result so i hope u like it too.
[*][b][size=2]Falmer Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Forsworn Armor[/size][/b] 
   I like the way the bra string showing off, it\'s so sexy if you ask me.
[*][b][size=2]Imperial Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Imperial Light Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Imperial Studded Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Stormcloak and Hold Guard Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Stormcloak Officer Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Tulius Armor[/size][/b]
  This is one of my most favorite, it\'s dedicated to my number one supporter VRDaphni and i\'m sure u will like it.
[*][b][size=2]Penitus Oculatus Armor[/size][/b] 
[*][b][size=2]Dark Brotherhood Armor[/size][/b] 
[*][b][size=2]Bandit Armor Variant 1[/size][/b] 
[*][b][size=2]Bandit Armor Variant 2[/size][/b] 
[*][b][size=2]Bandit Armor Variant 3[/size][/b] 
[*][b][size=2]Bandit Armor Variant 4[/size][/b] 
[*][b][size=2]Tsun\'s Armor[/size][/b] 
Since this one is kinda imposible to get using proper way, i made it craftable under Steel category and divide it into three pieces. I was canged into Heavy armor since its more suited into it in my opinion.
[/list]  
With this all Vanilla armor are finished. Thank you for all of your support, i won\'t make it without all of you and now is the time to move onto next work.
 

[b][size=4][color=#DB7900]SevenBase Version[/color][/size][/b]
This will taking longer than expected since i\'m not just converting from UNP to SevenBase but also redoing some part of the armor from scracth so it will have better weighting and shape, just considered it as a [b]REMASTERED[/b] version. And yes it has BBP support so don\'t cry.
I use SevenBase Cleavage version for my conversion so it will have a push up cleavage effect on the armor.

[list=1]
[*][b][size=2]Glass Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Ancient Nord Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Orcish Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Elven Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Steel Plate Armor[/size][/b]  
[*][b][size=2]Wolf Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Steel Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Savior\'s Hide Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Dragonscale Armor[/size][/b]
Redesigned the armor by removing thigh plate.
[*][b][size=2]Dragonplate Armor[/size][/b]
Complete remastered version, I put alot of effort into this because this armor are my first mod ever made.
You can compare UNP version with this one because this was on different level since the armor, gauntlets, and the boots are fully reworked.
[*][b][size=2]Darkbrotherhood Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Nightingale Armor[/size][/b] 
Redesigned the armor by removing shoulder and adding long gloves.
[*][b][size=2]Forsworn Armor[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Ebony Armor[/size][/b]
Complete remastered version, changing the design by reworked everything and now it has one of the best re-meshes. 
Note: Designed to work perfectly with Cabal texture, get the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37487/] aMidianBorn Ebony[/url] 
[*][b][size=2]Ebony Mail Armor[/size][/b]
Complete remastered version, changing the design by reworked everything and now it has one of the best re-meshes. 
Note: Designed to work perfectly with Cabal texture, get the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37422/]aMidianBorn Ebonymail[/url]
[*][b][size=2]Dwarven Armor[/size][/b] [b][size=2][color=red]New[/color][/size][/b]
Complete remastered version, changing the design by reworked everything and now it has one of the best re-meshes. 
Note: Designed to work perfectly with Cabal texture, get the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24398/] aMidianBorn Dwarven[/url] 
[*][b][size=2]Thieves Guild Armor[/size][/b] [b][size=2][color=red]New[/color][/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Guild Leader Armor[/size][/b] [b][size=2][color=red]New[/color][/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Linwe\'s Armor[/size][/b] [b][size=2][color=red]New[/color][/size][/b]
[*][b][size=2]Karliah\'s Armor[/size][/b] [b][size=2][color=red]New[/color][/size][/b]
[/list]


[heading][b][size=6][color=#DB7900]Current Work In Progress List :[/color][/size][/b][/heading]
  - Don\'t ask what armor that i\'m working, i\'ll do it random. 
  - As a side project i\'m doing a remodel of helmet, when i have made 4 or 5 it will be uploaded here.

[heading][b][size=6][color=#DB7900]Future Plan :[/color][/size][/b][/heading]
  - Converting all Dawnguard armor. 
  - Converting all Dragonborn armor. 
 
 
[heading][b][size=6][color=#DB7900]Known Issues :[/color][/size][/b][/heading]
 - BBP is crashing on several people, the problem came from using different skeleton. In order not to get crash use skeleton that support BBP.


[heading][b][size=6][color=#DB7900]Requirement :[/color][/size][/b][/heading]
For UNP type require to use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/]Dimon99\'s UNP[/url]
For SevenBase type require to use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36992/?]Sevennity\'s SevenBase[/url] 
For Skeleton with BBP support use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800/?]XP32\'s Maximum Skeleton[/url] or [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16712/?]Skulltyrant\'s Custom Skeleton Replacers[/url]


[heading][b][size=6][color=#DB7900]Recommended Mods :[/color][/size][/b][/heading]
 - CaBaL make a collection of the best Lore Friendly HD texture in [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24909/]aMidianBorn Book of Silence[/url]
 - MaddBomber83 make compilation package of armor to make it easier for you in [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34102/]UNP Armor Replacer Package[/url]
 - Xanshio made Daedric glow more awesome, use his weapon glow mod to make your character even more coller in [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21570]Skyrim Extended Glow[/url]
 - VRDaphni made gorgeous and lovely companion to accompany you adventuring Skyrim, so check out [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36277]Lunari Warriors[/url]
 
 
[heading][b][size=6][color=#DB7900]Credits :[/color][/size][/b][/heading]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3076419]Nightasy[/url] for his awesome [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19249/]Tutorial for creating Armor[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/537675]Dimon99[/url] for creating [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/]UNP Body[/url]. Oh God, i love that small ass LOL
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2984692]Xanshio[/url] for his [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21570]Skyrim Extended Glow[/url]. Thanks to him i can finished my Daedric armor.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2113195]asianboy345[/url] for helping in Elven armor optional download.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2304498]Wast1980[/url] for helping in armor flagged not showing amulet/necklace [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35525]AllArmorsShowAmulets[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/946593]Nemesis03[/url] for helping in correcting ground/world item.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/135359]ferny67[/url] for helping in adding new armor into standalone.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3970139]VRDaphni[/url] for always supporting me.


[heading][b][size=6][color=#DB7900]Installation :[/color][/size][/b][/heading]
 - Extract Zip files and move the extracted \\\"Data\\\" folder into your Skyrim directory. It usually at C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
 - Activate the *.esp file in your launcher, if You use the Standalone version.


[heading][b][size=6][color=#DB7900]Uninstallation :[/color][/size][/b][/heading]
[b][size=2]Standalone[/size][/b]
 - Go to C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\armor\\crosscrusade and delete the installed folder.( Look into the zip files so you don\'t delete the wrong folder )
 - Go to C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data and delete the *.esp file

[b][size=2]Replacer[/size][/b]
- Go to C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\armor and delete the installed folder. ( Look into the zip files so you don\'t delete the wrong folder )
